dmca.title: google dmca - copacabanarunners.net
dmca.body:
Copyright Infringement Notification for AdSense and Web Search

I, Helio Augusto Ferreira Fontes, owner of the website www.copacabanarunners.net , request Google, Inc. to remove the websites www.oesportista.com.br and www.bemdesaude.com.br , both owned by the company "Jaime da Silva Nunes ME", from your web search index and adsense program, since they were built almost totally with non-authorized copies of articles from my site www.copacabanarunners.net , what is a copyright infringement.

The proof of the copyright infringement can be found using http://web.archive.org . For example, the page www.copacabanarunners.net/mineral.html was non-authorized copied at
http://www.oesportista.com.br/content/sais_minerais_e_saude.html and http://www.bemdesaude.com.br/content/sais_minerais_e_saude.html . The proof that the page www.copacabanarunners.net/mineral.html exists before the creation of the websites www.oesportista.com.br (April 2006, information can be found at by http://registro.br) and www.bemdesaude.com.br (June 2006, information can be found at by http://registro.br) is that it was cached by Internet Archive Wayback Machine (http://web.archive.org ) since February 2001, according to http://web.archive.org/web/*/www.copacabanarunners.net/mineral.html


1.Identification of the copyrighted work that has been infringed

The copyrighted work at issue is the collection of articles of the site www.copacabanarunners.net, registered with Network Solutions ( http://www.networksolutions.com/whois/index.jsp) and published on Internet since February 12, 2001. More than 200 articles from www.copacabanarunners.net were copied by www.oesportista.com.br and www.bemdesaude.com.br without authorization.


2.Identification of the material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above

Since the websites www.oesportista.com.br and www.bemdesaude.com.br were built with non-authorized copies of articles from my site www.copacabanarunners.net , there are hundreds of pages on www.oesportista.com.br and www.bemdesaude.com.br that infringed my copyrighted work. Bellow, I list some pages from www.oesportista.com.br and www.bemdesaude.com.br that infringed my copyrighted work:
